isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 3200, 4100, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 7600, 8500, 8600 Models Built After 05/19/2003 - CAB FEATURES - SATELLITE COMMUNICATION QUALCOMM MCT OR IMCT SYSTEM - CIRCUIT FUNCTIONS

svcproc.title: CIRCUIT FUNCTIONS

figure.caption: Satellite Communication QUALCOMM MCT Or IMCT System Function Diagram

calloutgroup.callout1: 3. MOBILE COMMUNICATIONS TERMINAL (MCT) OR INTEGRATED MOBILE COMMUNICATIONS TERMINAL (IMCT) SYSTEM QUALCOMM SATELLITE COMMUNICATION SYSTEM
F28 (10A) IGNITION & F38 (10A) BATTERY SATELLITE COMMUNICATION SYSTEM FUSES (1014)

svcproc.para: The MSG light illuminates, in the cluster, when the satellite communication QUALCOMM Mobile Communications Terminal (MCT) or Integrated Mobile Communications Terminal (IMCT) system is turned on by the power thourgh fuses F28 and F38. The ECM will provide engine information to the IMCT satellite communication system.
